Articles.Content:
So, for the Naval Battles forum game, I made a War Edition version of my ULW SD40-2. What makes it war edition? It has a full carbody (i.e. it's railings are replaced with extra walling to armor it more) and it's armed with two Beamwing I missiles peeking out of the front.

During testing, I had another SD40-2WE come up behind the primary one, and both missiles were fired into the missile space of the first one, but hardly any damage was done due to the close-range shots of its missiles. 

More testing will be done before ULW releases its SD40-2WE.
